PackageOracle.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_DISPATCH
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_DISPATCH
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.853633000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_work_order_dispatch;

body.name: DA_WORK_ORDER_DISPATCH
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_WORK_ORDER_DISPATCH
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.25.865331000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_dispatch.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || dispatch_dttm || '|' || status_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order_dispatch a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.dispatch_dttm
,a.status_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_work_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.dispatch_dttm
,add.status_cd
,add.comment_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.work_order_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_dispatch.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_dispatch.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || dispatch_dttm || '|' || status_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order_dispatch a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.dispatch_dttm
,a.status_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_work_order_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.dispatch_dttm
,add.status_cd
,add.comment_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_dispatch.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,dispatch_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,comment_txt IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_dispatch.add, parms=' || work_order_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || dispatch_dttm || '|' || status_cd || '|' || comment_txt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_work_order_dispatch a
(
a.work_order_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.dispatch_dttm
,a.status_cd
,a.comment_txt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.work_order_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.dispatch_dttm
,add.status_cd
,add.comment_txt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_dispatch.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,work_order_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_work_order_dispatch.del, parms=' || work_order_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_work_order_dispatch a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.work_order_id = del.work_order_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_work_order_dispatch.del');

END del;

END da_work_order_dispatch;
